column1: Balduzzi et al. - 2019 - How to perform a meta-analysis with R a practical tutorial.pdf
column2: How to perform a meta-analysis with R: a practical tutorial
column6: The paper focuses on a tutorial for performing meta-analyses using R software, using an example of haloperidol in schizophrenia treatment. It does not address interventions (Natalizumab, SID, EID) or outcomes related to Multiple Sclerosis (MS), thus failing to meet the specified criteria.

column2: Recurrent disease-activity rebound in a patient with multiple sclerosis after natalizumab discontinuations for pregnancy planning
column6: The paper describes a 16-year-old patient (a child), which violates the population inclusion criterion of Adults.
